title: Episode 80: The Mandela Effect
description:
Some things we swear we remember exactly. A movie quote. The name of a book. The death of a celebrity. But then we find out - we were wrong. Is this revelation the correction of some false memory, the result of glitches in our brains, or are we flip-flopping between dimensions and alternate realities?
*This episode contains spoilers for the movie The Mandela Effect
Go to fabfitfun.com and enter CREEPY for $10 off your first box!
